name: Bubbleverse
description:
In Bubbleverse you grow and collect bubbles for money which you can spend on upgrades. Bubbles attract each other and merge when they come close enough to each other. When bubbles merge they add their values together and get a bonus.

Instructions:

  • click a bubble to collect it
  • click "spawn" button to spawn a bubble
  • there are two upgrade categories unlocked in the beginning - access them with the white buttons at the top of the sidebar
  • the third and currently last upgrade category is unlocked after the first prestige tier
  • UI should be relatively self explanatory

What will be added in the future?

  • offline progress
  • more upgrades of course
  • infinite prestige tiers
  • more achievements (and achievement rewards)

If you have any feedback, ideas or questions feel free to comment!

Please do not use Safari as there are known technical issues and the game will probably crash! Game tested and working on: Firefox, Chrome on both Windows & macOS (Linux should work as well). Use a recent browser version to assure compatibility.

The game is open source: GitHub Link. It is developed using p5.js. Also uses notify.js and jquery. If you have questions / suggestions about contributing / development please also feel free to write an email to embergames@protonmail.com.
